TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule - Six Monthly (DVOR-Mopiens MARU-220)
(Parameters 1 to 6 are to be checked with external test equipments)

1. AND (Monitor action initiated when 
 both monitors on alarm
 2. OR (Monitor action initiated when 
 any one monitors on alarms
1. When monitor on alarm for main Tx,\n s/by Tx changeover to antenna.\n When monitor on alarm for s/by Tx, also system Shuts down.
